summary: 增加Prometheus实例（仅支持aliyun-cs、ecs两种类型的实例）Remote Write配置。

schema.title: prometheus实例Id
schema.description: Prometheus实例ID。仅支持aliyun-cs、ecs两种类型的实例。

schema.title:
prometheus remote write配置（yaml格式），示例：
remote_write:
  - name: rw1
    url: "http://cn-hangzhou-intranet.arms.aliyuncs.com/prometheus/uid/xx/cn-hangzhou/api/v3/write"
    basic_auth:
      username: xxx
      password: xxx
    write_relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [ instance_id ]
        separator: ;
        regex: si
        replacement: $1
        action: keep
schema.example: 参见请求参数补充说明。

Data.title: 返回成功增加的remoewrite名称，或异常信息。
Data.description: 返回成功增加的remoteWrite名称，或异常信息。

Success.description:
操作是否成功：

- `true`：操作成功
- `false`：操作失败

Code.description: 状态码。200为成功，其他状态码为异常。

400.errorMessage: The request uses the same client token as a previous, but non-identical request. Do not reuse a client token with different requests, unless the requests are identical.

title: 增加Prometheus实例的Remote Write配置
requestParamsDescription:
RemoteWriteYaml示例值：
```
remote_write:
  - name: rw1
    url: "http://cn-hangzhou-intranet.arms.aliyuncs.com/prometheus/uid/xx/cn-hangzhou/api/v3/write"
    basic_auth:
      username: xxx
      password: xxx
    write_relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [ instance_id ]
        separator: ;
        regex: si
        replacement: $1
        action: keep
```
